Strips listed are The Little King, Polly and Her Pals, Thimble Theater, The Katzenjammer Kids, Bringing Up Father, Pogo, Betty Boop, Krazy Kat, Flash Gordon, and Li'l Abner. Interviewed for the story are Peter Kelly, Randall Scott, and Denis Kitchen.
